featured.text: The mayor said new buildings would be illuminated, notably along the banks of the Seine, which would become a luminous strip, while Notre Dame Cathedral would be lit from the inside to show off its stained glass windows.

definition.zh_def: 被污損或染色的，通常指表面或材料上有顏色或污漬。
definition.en_def: Marked or discolored by a substance, often referring to a surface or material that has been affected by color or dirt.
definition.example: The white shirt was stained with coffee.
